message: I propose we split the funds with a 7:3 ratio. This allows us to share the wealth while also giving you a substantial portion.
I propose we split the money 60/40 in my favor. This is a fair split considering I have the power to reject any further offers.
Considering the inflation, I propose a new 52.5:47.5 ratio. This maintains a fair distribution while accounting for the diminishing value of money in each subsequent round.
